data.comment: The match is underway. Oostende have kicked-off.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Benjamin van Durmen is on a sub for Kouadio-Yves Dabila for Mouscron.
Mouscron kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Arthur Theate puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 65, Fernando Da Cruz is making the team's second substitution at Versluys Arena with Beni Badibanga replacing Darly Nlandu.
Oostende make their first substitution with Marko Kvasina replacing Kevin Vandendriessche.
The away team replace Harlem Gnohere with Capita.
In the minute 81, Great finish from Fashion Sakala to give Oostende a 2-0 lead.
Indy Boonen is replacing Fashion Sakala for the home team.
Ari Skulason is replacing Andrew Hjulsager for the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
Cameron McGeehan (Oostende) has received a first yellow card.
Cameron McGeehan scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 3-0.
